items.sentence: I don\'t think a native French speaker would say it that way.
I don\'t think that we can move this piano without some help.
I don\'t think you need that much money to buy what you need.
I enforce the rules even though I don\'t agree with them all.
Tom almost died after eating the mushrooms Mary had gathered.
Tom and Mary talked about what they should do with the money.
Tom apologized to Mary for accidentally stepping on her foot.
Tom is hoping that everybody will leave, so he can go to bed.
You aren\'t suggesting we give all the money to Tom, are you?
You have no idea how hard I\'ve had to work to get this done.
Tom thought it would be funny to put an egg on Mary\'s chair.
Tom thought that Mary wouldn\'t be able to beat him at chess.
Tom tiptoed across the room so he wouldn\'t wake up the baby.
Tom told Mary that she was the fattest woman he\'d ever seen.
An opportunity like this only comes along once in a lifetime.
How many people did you buy Christmas presents for this year?
I called the police and reported that my car had been stolen.
If I\'d known Tom was in the hospital, I\'d have visited him.
If it hadn\'t been for the storm, I would\'ve arrived sooner.
Beethoven went over to the piano, sat down and began to play.
